name: Easing Gradient
description:
Linear gradients often have hard edges where they start and/or end.

This plugin adds gradient stops to approximate easing functions.


Work on this plugin has stopped in favor of the much more feature-rich alternative: https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/907899097995668330/Easing-Gradients


Roadmap:

- Easing function selection

- Custom bezier curve editor

- Custom color step input

- Color space selection
